alert.note: Alert for Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 29 at 7:52PM CDT until August 31 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Madison and Rankin Counties. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 303 feet, Minor overbank flooding is occurring along the reach of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Monday the stage was 304.2 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 303 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Pearl River Ratliff`s Ferr 303.0 304.2 Mon 7 pm CDT 302.8 301.2 299.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning.
